reviews.review: 拉機遊戲我才玩400個小時就花7000
Топ прайм за 1080 купил а читеры всё равно попадаються

Если купить прайм то играть вполне можно. 
Но если играть без прайма есть обиженные жизнью люди которым даже говорить о том что он без прайма нихера не получит

Really great game. Always find myself coming back after playing other games. 
You won't regret getting and spending time playing this.

I have played cs for over 15 years and still nothing tops it!
Эта игра нормальная без читеров на прайме их меньше

Very good game. Keep getting into games full of russians, tk'd and losing games but hitting the odd 1 clip-worthy shot every 5 games. Which makes me want to keep coming back and play more.

Thanks valve.
Очень рекомендую поесть говна, но не играть в это говно
god juego y god comunidad nasheeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee quiero los logros xD

A comunidade é mais toxica que a do lol, a jogabilidade é razoavel, os graficos são aceitaveis. No mais devido a problemas de cheat, é muito dificil players definirem que joga bem iou não, não vale mais a pena comprar esse jogo..
Nice games and no toxic kind on prime
Its one of my fav games

This is the best game if you have friends who likes playing FPS games together. If not, you can play with good community of this game. If you are not a toxic player like others, your teammates will not be toxic.
very fun game to play with friends or alone has a very competitive side and a casual side wound recommend!
really good bame if u pay for prime

Aber ansonsten ist es auf jedenfall empfehlenswert.

The game is straight forward but there are still a lot of areas where one can constantly improve. I recommend this game!
